short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarise articles and ask follow-up questions using LLMs such as OpenAI's GPT (Chat GPT).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps summarise and highlights main points of any article, without having to read the whole article. You can also ask follow-up questions about the article, and it will provide you with answers based on page contents of a current tab.
